Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates audio playback.

This class is implemented by platform specific audioclip classes, DzWinAudioClip and DzMacAudioClip.

See also:
DzScene::getAudio(), DzScene::setAudio(), DzAudioImporter, DzMultiMediaMgr::importAudioClip()

Member Function Documentation

DzTime DzAudioClip::getCurrentPosition (  )  const [pure virtual]
Returns:
The current position of the audio clip in DzTime, as defined by DZ_TICKS_PER_SECOND.
See also:
setCurrentPosition()

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

QString DzAudioClip::getFilename (  )  const
Returns:
The filename associated with the audio clip.
DzTime DzAudioClip::getLength (  )  const [pure virtual]
Returns:
The length of the audio clip in DzTime, as defined by DZ_TICKS_PER_SECOND.

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

DzError DzAudioClip::openFile ( const QString &  filename  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Opens the file specified by filename and sets up the audio clip.

Parameters:
filename The name of the audio file to load.
Returns:
true if the file was successfully opened, false otherwise;

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

void DzAudioClip::pause (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Pauses the audio clip without resetting current position.

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

void DzAudioClip::play (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Plays the audio clip from current position.

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

void DzAudioClip::reset (  )  [pure virtual, slot]

Resets the current position of the audio clip to the beginning.

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

void DzAudioClip::save ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [virtual]

Saves the audio clip filename to the native file.

Parameters:
file The file to save the information on the clip to.
void DzAudioClip::setCurrentPosition ( DzTime  pos  )  [pure virtual]

Sets the current position of the audio clip. Position is specified in DzTime, as defined by DZ_TICKS_PER_SECOND.

Parameters:
pos The time to set the audio clip position to.
See also:
getCurrentPosition()

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.

void DzAudioClip::setFilename ( const QString &  filename  )  [protected]

Sets the filename associated with the audio clip.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file that the audio clip was loaded from.
void DzAudioClip::setRate ( double  rateMultiplier  )  [pure virtual]

Sets the playback rate of the audio clip.

Parameters:
rateMultiplier A multiplier of the normal rate - For example, a value of 2 will set the playback rate to double normal speed, and a value 0f .5 will set the playback rate to half normal speed.

Implemented in DzMacAudioClip, and DzWinAudioClip.
